examples: She goes to work every day.
He works as a software engineer.
Ela vai ao trabalho todos os dias.
Ele trabalha como engenheiro de software.

suggested: Why did the computer go to the doctor? Because it had a virus!
Working long hours without a break can lead to burnout and decreased job satisfaction.
Feeling frustrated with a difficult project at work can lead to feelings of anger and stress.
Being recognized for a job well done and receiving a promotion can be a surprising and fulfilling experience at work.
The smell of freshly brewed coffee in the office break room.
The feeling of accomplishment after a long day of productive work.
The connection to colleagues and a sense of teamwork while working on a group project.
